rule: The array should contain the paper's authors instead of the model names.
input: Abstract: Doe presents BetaModel, improving on previous work.
validityText:
The input starts with "Abstract: ", which matches the requirement outlined in the input specification that the input begins with "Abstract: ". The text following "Abstract: " appears to be an English-language text, describing a machine learning paper abstract mentioning a model name "BetaModel". Additionally, the input contains information typical to an abstract by mentioning a model and an aspect of its contribution ("improving on previous work"). There is no requirement in the specification regarding the length of the input or specific content beyond being an abstract text, and the mention of a model name is permitted though not required. Therefore, based on the direct comparison with the provided input specification, the input complies fully.

No violation.
OK
